anyOf.description: The hero component is used to display a large banner at the top of the homepage.

title.description: The title of the hero banner

subtitle.description: The contents of the hero banner

anyOf.title: Iframe component
anyOf.description: The iframe component is used to embed a whitelisted external webpage within the current page.

content.title: Embed code
content.description: Paste in an embed code. Refer to the guide to understand how to embed your content.

title.title: Description
title.description: Briefly describe what the embedded content is about. This isn’t displayed on the page but is accessible to screen readers.

alt.title: Alternate text
alt.description: Add a descriptive text so that visually impaired users can understand your image

size.title: Image size
size.description: On mobile, images will always fill up to the page width even if you choose “Small”.

buttonLabel.description: A descriptive text. Avoid generic text such as “Click here” or “Learn more”

secondaryButtonLabel.title: Secondary button text
secondaryButtonLabel.description: A descriptive text. Avoid generic text such as “Click here” or “Learn more”

id.description: The ID to use for anchor links

maxColumns.description: This only affects how the block appears on large screens

label.description: Add a link under your block. Avoid generic text such as “Click here” or “Learn more”

imageFit.description: Select "Resize image to fit" only if the image has a white background.
